name: soul-dew
effect: Held by Latias or Latios: Increases the holder’s Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.
short_effect: Raises Latias and Latios’s Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.

flavor_text.black_white: A wondrous orb to be held by Latios or Latias. It raises both the Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A wondrous orb to be held by Latios or Latias. It raises both the Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
